findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Owner can change router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the router address.

findings.title: Owner can change _maxWalletAmount value
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the _maxWalletAmount variable.

findings.title: Owner enable and disable burn
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable and disable the burn function, which can potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Activation of prepareForPreSale and afterPreSale Setting Presets
findings.description: The owner has the ability to activate prepareForPreSale and afterPreSale setting presets, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can recover stray tokens from the contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to recover stray tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
